#summary translating code from Scratch to UnityScript

= Scratch to UnityScript =

UnityScript is Unity's scripting language which is based on JavaScript. For most purposes, the languages are identical so you can use any JavaScript language reference as a guide:

 * [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide JavaScript language guide]
 * [http://docs.unity3d.com/Documentation/ScriptReference/index.html Unity Script Reference] (this only documents Unity library functions)
